The phonon density of states and thermal properties are accessed by the small-displacement approach implemented in the PHONOPY code
40 . This computational package solves the phonon equations in the harmonic approximation for a constant atomic volume. By adjusting the volume to account for thermal expansion (as we have done in Fig. 1) one rather applies a quasi-harmonic approximation of the phonons.
